homepage.mainDescription: “Life is not complex. We are complex. Life is simple, and the simple thing is the right thing.” — Oscar Wilde
homepage.subtitle: The Simplicity of Your Life is Defined By Your Needs
homepage.description: The simplicity of your life is defined by your needs. The fewer needs you have, the more simple your life is. I like this definition of simple living because it accommodates the reality that people live different lifestyles, and how they adapt them to be simple is open for personal interpretation.

about.mainTitle: Simple people who are fond of simplicity itself
about.mainDescription: The more we made our lives simple, the more room we could find for the life to fit in.
